promptLanguage: Choose your language: 'en' for English or 'es' for Spanish

en.welcome: Welcome to this calculator! You can add, subtract, multiply and divide two numbers.
en.operation: What operation would you like to perform
en.askNumAgain: Sorry, that wasn't a number. Try again
en.askOperatorAgain: Sorry, we don't know that operation. Try again
en.askKeepGoingAgain: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Type 'y' or 'n'
en.askAnotherCalculation: Do you want another calculation? (y / n)
en.farewell: Thanks for using this calculator! Bye!
